timeline.bodyText:
The test name shouldn't end in IT, because surefire discovers it as an integration test, tries to run it independently, and fails:
https://ci.infinispan.org/job/Infinispan/job/PR-8906/6/testReport/junit/org.infinispan.server.functional/HotRodCacheContinuousQueries/testQueries_true_/
timeline.author: danberindei

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdminIT.java b/server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdmin.java
similarity index 98%
rename from server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdminIT.java
rename to server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdmin.java
index 89ea23da63..e201306826 100644
--- a/server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdminIT.java
+++ b/server/tests/src/test/java/org/infinispan/server/functional/HotRodAdmin.java

@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
  * @author Ryan Emerson
  * @since 12.0
  */
-public class HotRodAdminIT {
+public class HotRodAdmin {
 
    @ClassRule
    public static InfinispanServerRule SERVERS = ClusteredIT.SERVERS;
